# example spatial plot manifest 
# 
#
#######
#
## file containing list of cell types to be plotted
cell_types_file	markerSeriesB.txt	

## *.rda file containing Halo data
data_file	/home/byrne/halo/data/melanoma/objectAnalysisData/Untreated_ObjectAnalysisData_MegaTableV2.rda

## directory of *.annotations XML files containing Halo annotations
annotations_dir	/home/byrne/halo/nicks_spatial/inputs/BoundryAnnotationFiles/Untreated_boundaryCoordinates

## log file; if NULL, name will be automatically generated
log	Untreated_markerSeriesB_spatial_plots.log	

## print log messages to both stdout and to log
verbose	TRUE

## print debug messages
debug	TRUE

## pad FOV
pad	30
